articles.title: UK factories bolstered by weak sterling and global strength — CBI
articles.description: UK employers group the CBI said on Tuesday that the country’s manufacturing sector is in “robust” shape, thanks to strength in the global economy and a weak pound, but that crashing out of the EU without a deal “would be immensely damaging” for both sides.
